modules.description: Checks DNS records to validate email sources, including verifying the sender's IP address against SPF, DKIM, and DMARC policies. Operates on email headers, DNS query results, and network addresses. Used to prevent email spoofing and ensure authenticity of incoming messages.

Provides functions to retrieve DNS resource records by name and type, operating on a context type `t` and returning results wrapped in Lwt. Works with DNS record keys, domain names, and custom error types. Used to fetch specific DNS data in asynchronous DNS resolution workflows.
